channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Network Security Management (NSM)

item.title: CVE-2017-3964|2024-09-17T04:14:15.063Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Reflective Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a URL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-3971|2024-09-17T02:05:54.082Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cryptanalysis vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to view confidential information via insecure use of RC4 encryption cyphers.
